title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the export process fails and does not create a valid zip file.
EB: After selecting File > Export > Zip File, the export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the selected files, regardless of whether they have the same name or are located in different directories.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as "foo.txt").3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose Zip File to export.4.
